means: 用在祈使句中以引起人注意

sentence.Network_en: A well-executed shot of a tall ship is a joy to behold.
sentence.Network_cn: 欣赏优秀的高桅横帆船摄影作品是种乐趣。

sentence.Network_en: Behold a series of thrilling photographs of Felix.
sentence.Network_cn: 看费利克斯拍的一系列惊心动魄的照片。

sentence.Network_en: He was a joy to behold.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 《背诵为王全套文本》全文在线阅读及txt下载 ... crew 班，组，工作队 behold vt. 看 precarious adj. 不稳定的.
GRE 词汇表(红宝书) - 豆丁网 ... beguiling adj． 欺骗的，迷人的 behold v． 目睹，看见 beholder h． 目睹者.
普通英汉小词典_翻译家(Fanyijia.com) ... behind 在后 behold 注视 being 生命;存在.
GRE 词汇表(红宝书) - 豆丁网 ... beguiling adj． 欺骗的，迷人的 behold v． 目睹，看见 beholder h． 目睹者.

list.abs: In the distance , I behold colorful ads and steaming cars , with jazz faintly heard ., 在距离 , 我注视五颜六色的 ads 和蒸汽车 , 与爵士乐微弱地听见.
and the people behold something extraordinary ., 于是人们见到一种不同寻常的景象.
A normal beholder can become a wizard or sorcerer ., 正常的眼魔都可以成为法师或术士.
watching their heroes in South Africa , they will also behold themselves : sadder and a wiser people than they were four years ago ;欣赏他们的英雄在南非的表演的同时，他们也会关注自身：相比四年前更加忧伤却也更加理智。

derivation.yuyuan_name: Old English  bihaldan, from bi- 'thoroughly' + haldan 'to hold'. Parallel Germanic words have the sense 'maintain, retain'; the notion of 'looking' is found only in English

entry.def: If you behold someone or something, you see them.

example.ex: She looked into his eyes and beheld madness...
example.tran: 透过他的眼睛，她看到了疯狂。

example.ex: He was a joy to behold.

entry.def: People used to say or write 'Behold' to draw people's  attention to something.

example.ex: Behold a series of thrilling photographs of Felix.
example.tran: 看费利克斯拍的一系列惊心动魄的照片。

auth_sentence.content: Frankel is absolutely breathtaking and a joy to behold.
auth_sentence.res_content: Frankel is absolutely breathtaking and a joy to behold.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Frankel is absolutely breathtaking and a joy to behold.

auth_sentence.content: Behold the reasoning ability of the typical pro-choice advocate.
auth_sentence.res_content: Behold the reasoning ability of the typical pro-choice advocate.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Behold the reasoning ability of the typical pro-choice advocate.

auth_sentence.content: Price deflation in technology is a wonder to behold.
auth_sentence.res_content: Price deflation in technology is a wonder to behold.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Price deflation in technology is a wonder to behold.

sentences.en: His eyes had never beheld such opulence.
sentences.cn: 他从未见过这样的财富。

sentences.en: Behold, the new king is crowned.

means.word_mean: (叙述中用于引出某人意外的出现)哎哟，你瞧；嗨，真想不到

sentences.en: I walked into the pub and, lo and behold, there was my boss with his wife.
sentences.cn: 我走进酒吧，哎呀，真想不到，我的老板和他的妻子正在那里。
